ecological_assessment.qualitative_description: The model captures most NPZ model characteristics, but with some deviations from the exact mathematical structure specified

nutrient_equation_uptake.explanation: Partial Michaelis-Menten kinetics present (N/(K_N+N)), but missing self-shading term (a/(b+c*P))

nutrient_equation_recycling.explanation: Partial nutrient recycling present (gamma * mortality terms), but lacks specific predation-based recycling term lambda*P^2/(mu^2+P^2)*Z

nutrient_equation_mixing.explanation: No explicit environmental mixing term (k*(N0-N)) present in the model

phytoplankton_equation_growth.explanation: Nutrient uptake term present (r_max * N * P / (K_N + N)), but missing detailed self-shading component

phytoplankton_equation_loss.explanation: Includes mortality (m_P * P) and predation-like loss (grazing), but mixing term not explicitly represented

zooplankton_equation.explanation: Captures zooplankton growth through predation and mortality with very similar mathematical structure
